    • Method Detail

      • getStory

        Story getStory(java.util.UUID id)
        Grabs a story with the given id from the local database
        Parameters:
        id - The GUID of the story
        Returns:
        The Story object or null if the id doesn't exist in the database

      • getStories

        java.util.ArrayList<Story> getStories()
        Retrieves all stories located on local storage
        Returns:
        Collection of all stories on local storage. Collection is empty if there are no stories

      • getStoriesAuthoredBy

        java.util.ArrayList<Story> getStoriesAuthoredBy(java.lang.String author)
        Retrieves all stories located on local storage by an author
        Returns:
        Collection of all stories on local storage by an author. Collection is empty if there are no stories by author.

      • getStoryFragment

        StoryFragment getStoryFragment(java.util.UUID id)
        Retrieves story fragments by specific ID from local storage
        Parameters:
        id - The GUID of the fragment
        Returns:
        StoryFragment instance or null

      • getStoryFragments

        java.util.ArrayList<StoryFragment> getStoryFragments(java.util.UUID storyid)
        Retrieves all StoryFragments for a particular Story's _ID
        Parameters:
        storyid - The _ID for a story
        Returns:
        A Collection of StoryFragments. Empty if none exist.

      • getBookmark

        Bookmark getBookmark(java.util.UUID storyid)
        Gets the Bookmark from the story ID
        Parameters:
        storyid - The _ID of the story
        Returns:
        The Bookmark object

      • getAllBookmarks

        java.util.ArrayList<Bookmark> getAllBookmarks()
        Gets all Bookmarks in the database
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing all bookmarks

      • getAuthoredStory

        boolean getAuthoredStory(java.util.UUID storyId)
        Checks if a Story id is in the AuthoredStories table
        Parameters:
        storyId - ID of story to check for
        Returns:
        Whether or not the Story is there

      • getAuthoredStories

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.UUID> getAuthoredStories()
        Gets the list of all AuthoredStories
        Returns:
        List containing all UUIDs in the AuthoredStories table

        Parameters:

        Returns:
